mapper.insert: insert into sys_meal_bind( meal_bind_id, meal_id, repertory_id, goods_id, create_user, create_time )values( #{mealBindId}, #{mealId}, #{repertoryId}, #{goodsId}, #{createUser}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select t.meal_bind_id, t.meal_id, t.repertory_id, (select a.total from sys_repertory a where a.repertory_id = t.repertory_id) as total, t.goods_id, (select c.factory_name from sys_goods b left join sys_factory c on c.factory_id = b.factory_id where b.goods_id = t.goods_id) as factory_name, (select c.factory_code from sys_goods b left join sys_factory c on c.factory_id = b.factory_id where b.goods_id = t.goods_id) as factory_code, (select b.goods_name from sys_goods b where b.goods_id = t.goods_id) as goods_name, (select b.goods_code from sys_goods b where b.goods_id = t.goods_id) as goods_code, (select b.goods_img from sys_goods b where b.goods_id = t.goods_id) as goods_img, (select b.purch_price from sys_goods b where b.goods_id = t.goods_id) as purch_price, (select b.unit_price from sys_goods b where b.goods_id = t.goods_id) as unit_price, t.create_time, t.create_user, t.update_time, t.update_user from sys_meal_bind t where meal_id = #{mealId}
